title: Check vApp Options for Dell SRM VMs

messages.content: Check vApp Options for Dell SRM VMs

To check vApp options for Dell SRM VMs, follow these steps:

1. Select the VM.
2. Click Configure tab on vSphere client.
3. Select vApp options.

Verify that the "vApp options are enabled" message is displayed.

Note: If your Dell SRM VMs installations are geographically distributed in different locations, you must meet the network latency limits as described in Section 13 of the Pre-Requisites for Dell SRM 5.1.x.x Upgrade at Dell Support Site.
